effect_entries.effect:
Used outside of battle
:   Transports the trainer to the last-entered dungeon entrance.  Cannot be used outside, in buildings, or in []{location:distortion-world}, []{location:sinnoh-hall-of-origin-1}, []{location:spear-pillar}, or []{location:turnback-cave}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Transports user to the outside entrance of a cave.

flavor_text_entries.text:
長くて　丈夫な　ヒモ。
洞窟や　ダンジョンから
抜け出すことが　できる。

A long and durable rope.
Use it to escape instantly
from a cave or a dungeon.

Corda lunga e resistente che si usa per fuggire
in un batter d’occhio dalle grotte o da certi
luoghi chiusi.

Cuerda larga y resistente que sirve para huir de
cuevas y sitios cerrados en general.

Ein langes, festes Seil, das die sofortige Flucht
aus Höhlen oder Ähnlichem ermöglicht.

Une corde longue et solide permettant de sortir
rapidement d’une grotte ou d’un donjon.

길고 튼튼한 끈.
동굴이나 던전에서
빠져나올 수 있다.

ながくて　じょうぶな　ヒモ。
どうくつや　ダンジョンから
ぬけだすことが　できる。

A long, durable rope.
Use it to escape instantly from a cave
or a dungeon.

A long, durable rope.
Use it to escape instantly from a cave
or a dungeon.

Une corde longue et solide permettant
de sortir rapidement d’une grotte ou
d’un donjon.

or a dungeon.
